3)Improve QOL...","bold":false},{"text":"

TRUE SURVIVAL"},{"text":"

[{"text":"----Healing----","bold":true},{"text":"
True Survival reworks Healing from the ground up.","color":"gray","bold":false,"italic":true},{"text":"
âžŠ Throw a log onto a campfire to heal 3 hearts over 15 seconds.
âž‹ Maintain 16+ hunger in high light to heal you over several minutes.
âžŒ Don't forget vanilla options and new items! ","bold":false}]

[{"text":"---Workbench---","bold":true},{"text":"
Several items are crafted at the Artisan's workbench.","color":"gray","bold":false,"italic":true},{"text":"
âžŠ To assemble, place an item frame on a crafting table. Then, place The Dev Diary into the frame.

âž‹ Right click to use. Break the crafting table to disassemble.","bold":false}]

[{"text":"--Progression--","bold":true},{"text":"
Progression is reworked in several ways.","color":"gray","bold":false,"italic":true},{"text":"
âžŠ Various meta recipes have been altered. Refer to the recipe book for help.

âž‹ Difficulty in mobs and bosses are reworked as well. Good luck!","bold":false},{"text":"
